description:
The gate opens in summer and people come climbing the mountain to be chosen as a king.  Taiki is not sure if he’s capable of choosing a king but lady priest encourages him by saying “when the king is here, you’ll receive the Heaven’s mission.”  Taiki finds two prospective people, Ms. Risai and Mr. Gyoshu, both military commanders, but neither of them are a king.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Umi, Meikyuu no Kishi - Yon Shou
The Sea of Wind, The Shore of The Maze - Chapter 4
風の海 迷宮の岸 四章
